About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My name is Ilya Golovin, and I’m currently looking for a job in IT or web development. My background is full of different skills. In Moscow, Russia I worked in the company “Kalinagas” for almost 5 years. I was the top manager in that region, I was in charge pretty for everything from hire people to unload track with equipment.

Time has changed, I came to NYC in hope to broaden my horizons and begin a new life from scratch. As probably most immigrants my first goal was to get a job. Fortunatelly, I can drive a car pretty well, so that is how I became an Uber driver.

2 years of living in NYC and studying English I eventually applied in Kingsborough community college in Brooklyn. My major is Computer Information System(CIS). Basically, I learn third language which allowed me to speak with computer. I think that technology is our future where most of jobs will require work with machines(computers).
